data.text: @Crimealytics @skooks Where are all the Covid fear mongers now / you know, the ones spouting off before Mardi Gras. Crickets / those idiots can suck it 🍆

@Crimealytics Pretty sure I caught it Tuesday. Rapid test wasn’t positive Sunday but sure as heck was today. Went and got PCR’ed so I can be counted, but only 1 other car at Mahalia Jackson. Ghost town vs around New Years

@Crimealytics Are you going to bring back the graph of the 7-day rolling average for COVID cases?  It is very useful, more so now that the CDC's mask mandate guidance focussed on cases/100,000 in the past week for counties and parishes.
